text:
if you use the form example from the mod_autoindex docs, opera (5&6 
tested) escapes a "*" to %2A (yes: 42 ;-)

(At least) the P query parameter should be unescaped in general by 
mod_autoindex.
creator: nd@perlig.de

text: Fixed in 2.1 and proposed for backport. Thanks, André, for your report ;-)
creator: nd@perlig.de
